name: Primary Service Location Indicator
title: PSLI
definition: Identifies the use of the PSL field.

validEntry.description: LERG Switch CLLI (CSL Out of LATA Scenario)
LERG Switch CLLI (CSL In LATA Scenario)
Wireless Terminating Service (Out of LATA Scenario no

validEntryNotes: Valid entry of “E” is to be used to identify the customer’s Telcordia™ LERG™ Routing Guide based switch for Local Interconnection or Wireless Trunks when the actual switch is outside the LATA of services for the assigned NPA/NXX’s.

Valid entry of “F” is to be used to identify the customer’s LERG™ based switch for Local Interconnection or Wireless Trunks when the actual switch is inside the LATA of services for the assigned NPA/NXX’s.
usageNotes: Required when the CC and UNE fields are populated and the ACTL field is not populated.
Required when the ACT field is “N” or “C”, the first position of the REQTYP field is “M” and the CC or WST fields, or the CC and WST fields are populated.NOTE 3: Prohibited when the ACT field is “D”.
